sentences.en: " Now , Melly, I shall cry with vexation if you argue with me.
sentences.cn: " 怎么,媚兰,你再这样跟我争下去, 我可要气哭了.

sentences.en: After the old couple got over their initial surprise, vexation followed.
sentences.cn: 老夫妇惊异之后, 继以懊恼.

sentences.en: He kicked the broken machine in vexation.
sentences.cn: 他气得踢了那台坏机器一脚。

sentences.en: He preferred the vanity and vexation to the silence and unmovableness of the grave.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢虚空烦恼胜过坟墓里的寂寞和静止.

sentences.en: He was facing a life of toil and drudgery and vexation.
sentences.cn: 摆在他面前的是终身的苦役和折磨.

sentences.en: His face showed his vexation at the delay.
sentences.cn: 对这次延误,他露出不快的神情.

sentences.en: She was crying with vexation and shock.
sentences.cn: 她正在因烦恼和震惊而哭泣.
红衣主教感到恼火,脸涨得通红.

sentences.en: The old feeling of indulgent tenderness overcame her vexation, and she grew thoroughly moved and alarmed.
sentences.cn: 旧有的宽容的温情压倒她的烦恼, 她完全被感动而且吓住了.

sentences.en: The trees outside the window rustled as if they were laughing at his vexation and confusion.
sentences.cn: 那书房窗外的树木苏苏地讥笑他的心乱智昏.

sentences.en: They were no longer kept under any restraint and gave vent to their feelings of vexation.
sentences.cn: 他们已无所顾忌,在发泄牢骚.

sentences.en: This in itself was a terrible vexation to the archdeacon.
sentences.cn: 在会吏长看来,这件事本身就是极其令人恼火的.

sentences.en: Wu Sun - fu glanced down at the shadows , then stamped on them in his vexation.
sentences.cn: 吴荪甫垂头看了一眼, 焦躁地跺着脚.
